meanings.sent1: The family decided to reburied their beloved pet in the backyard.
meanings.sent2: After the flood, they had to reburied the coffin in a higher location.
meanings.sent3: The ghost joked that it wanted to be reburied in a haunted cemetery.
meanings.sent4: The memories of the past were reburied deep in her heart.
meanings.sent5: The ancient treasure was reburied by the archaeologists for future generations to discover.

meanings.sent1: The cemetery workers had to reburied the remains due to a mistake in the plot.
meanings.sent2: The archaeologists carefully reburied the ancient bones in a respectful manner.
meanings.sent3: The zombie joked that it wanted to be reburied in a zombie-only graveyard.
meanings.sent4: The secrets of the past were reburied in the depths of the ocean.
meanings.sent5: The lost civilization was reburied under layers of volcanic ash.
